title: I Will Pray For You
itunes:title: I Will Pray For You
description:
Today on the show we opened up the phone lines to see what our listeners thought about J.R Smith's wife praying for her husband to stop his cheating ways. Also, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to the 16 year old Karol Sanchez who staged her kidnapping and Angela helped some listeners out during "Ask Yee".

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Today on the show we opened up the phone lines to see what our listeners thought about J.R Smith's wife praying for her husband to stop his cheating ways. Also, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to the 16 year old Karol Sanchez who staged her kidnapping and Angela helped some listeners out during "Ask Yee".
